home.value: My motto is to devote my heart and soul to crafting immersive games that inspire thoughtful reflection and bring joy to players.

projects.name: Meta-UESTC
projects.shortDesc: Meta-UESTC is an AR Game designed to be used in conjunction with a physical circuit board. It enables users to clearly explore the building layouts as well as video and image information of UESTC, and offers a simulated university game experience.
highlights: Served as the sole developer, responsible for establishing the game framework, developing team tools, implementing both game and map functionalities, and managing version updates.

Functioned as the project’s game planner, designing a comprehensive simulation of a four-year college experience by creating more than tens of thousands of events and hundreds of in-game achievements.
Achieved revenue exceeding 500,000 CNY and maintained a top ranking on a major Chinese social media platform for one day.

detail.value: Meta-UESTC is primarily utilized as the core gift included with the admission letters for incoming freshmen at UESTC.

projects.name: Lorem Ipsum2
projects.shortDesc: Lorem ipsum is placeholder text commonly used in the graphic, print, and publishing industries for previewing layouts and visual mockups.
highlights: Innovated a ping-pong rendering system for seamless scene transitions.
Engineered a browser-based scene editor for real-time animation editing by animators.
Conceptualized and implemented interactive particle effects and sand transitions using shader.
